channel.title: news on DAMON Project
channel.description: Recent content in news on DAMON Project

item.title: DAMON News List
item.description: Below is a list of news around DAMON project. This list is not exhaustive but just a DAMON maintainer’s collection of news. If you find a news that should be added to this list, please let us know at sj@kernel.org and/or damon@lists.linux.dev. 2025 2025-01-02: DAMON quaterly news letter for Q4 2024 has been posted 2025-01-01: An LSF/MM/BPF topic proposal for gathering DAMON requirements for future MM has been posted. 2025-01-01: DAMON debugfs interface removal patch series have been posted
